description: Provides temporary, HTTP basic credentials that are associated with a given runtime IAM role and used by a cluster with fine-grained access control activated. You can use these credentials to connect to cluster endpoints that support username and password authentication.

parameters.name: ClusterId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the cluster.

nested_items.name: Credentials
nested_items.description: The credentials that you can use to connect to cluster endpoints that support username and password authentication.

nested_items.name: UsernamePassword
nested_items.description: The username and password that you use to connect to cluster endpoints.

nested_items.name: Username
nested_items.description: The username associated with the temporary credentials that you use to connect to cluster endpoints.

nested_items.name: Password
nested_items.description: The password associated with the temporary credentials that you use to connect to cluster endpoints.

nested_items.name: ExpiresAt
nested_items.description: The time when the credentials that are returned by the GetClusterSessionCredentials API expire.
